member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid
member.summary: DataGrid component for Maui

member.name: M:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.ScrollTo(System.Object,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ScrollToPosition,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Scrolls to the row
member.param: Item to scroll
Position of the row in screen
animated

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.ActiveRowColor
member.summary: Selected Row color

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.HeaderBackground
member.summary: BackgroundColor of the column header Default value is White

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.BorderColor
member.summary: Border color Default Value is Black

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.ItemSizingStrategy
member.summary: ItemSizingStrategy Default Value is MeasureFirstItem, except on Android

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.RowsBackgroundColorPalette
member.summary: Background color of the rows. It repeats colors consecutively for rows.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.RowsTextColorPalette
member.summary: Text color of the rows. It repeats colors consecutively for rows.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.ItemsSource
member.summary: ItemsSource of the DataGrid

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.Columns
member.summary: Columns

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.FontSize
member.summary: Font size of the cells. It does not sets header font size. Use HeaderLabelStyle to set header font size.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.FontFamily
member.summary: Sets the font family. It does not sets header font family. Use HeaderLabelStyle to set header font size.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.RowHeight
member.summary: Sets the row height

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.FooterHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets footer height

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.HeaderHeight
member.summary: Sets header height

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.IsSortable
member.summary: Gets or sets if the grid is sortable. Default value is true. Sortable columns must implement If you want to enable or disable sorting for specific column please use SortingEnabled property

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the page number. Default value is 1

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.PaginationEnabled
member.summary: Enables pagination in dataGrid. Default value is False

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.SelectionEnabled
member.summary: Enables selection in dataGrid. Default value is True

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.SelectedItem
member.summary: Selected item

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.IsRefreshing
member.summary: Displays an ActivityIndicator when is refreshing

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.BorderThickness
member.summary: Border thickness for header & each cell

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.HeaderBordersVisible
member.summary: Determines to show the borders of header cells. Default value is true

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.SortedColumnIndex
member.summary: Column index and sorting order for the DataGrid

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.HeaderLabelStyle
member.summary: Style of the header label. Style's TargetType must be Label.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.SortIcon
member.summary: Sort icon

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.SortIconStyle
member.summary: Style of the sort icon Style's TargetType must be Polygon.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.NoDataView
member.summary: View to show when there is no data to display

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the page count

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn
member.summary: Specifies each column of the DataGrid.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.Width
member.summary: Width of the column. Like Grid, you can use Absolute, star, Auto as unit.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.Title
member.summary: Column title

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.FormattedTitle
member.summary:
Formatted title for column
<DataGridColumn.FormattedTitle > <FormattedString > <Span Text = "Home" TextColor="Black" FontSize="13" FontAttributes="Bold" / > <Span Text = " (won-lost)" TextColor="#333333" FontSize="11" / > </FormattedString > </DataGridColumn.FormattedTitle >

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.PropertyName
member.summary: Property name to bind in the object

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.IsVisible
member.summary: Is this column visible?

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.StringFormat
member.summary: String format for the cell

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.CellTemplate
member.summary: Cell template. Default value is Label with binding PropertyName

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.LineBreakMode
member.summary: LineBreakModeProperty for the text. WordWrap by default.

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.HorizontalContentAlignment
member.summary: Horizontal alignment of the cell content

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.VerticalContentAlignment
member.summary: Vertical alignment of the cell content

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.SortingEnabled
member.summary: Defines if the column is sortable. Default is true Sortable columns must implement

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.HeaderLabelStyle
member.summary: Label Style of the header. TargetType must be Label.

member.name: M:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGridColumn.IsSortable(MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.DataGrid)
member.summary: Determines via reflection if the column's data type is sortable. If you want to disable sorting for specific column please use SortingEnabled property

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.IColorProvider
member.summary: Color Provider interface for Background and Text color of each row.

member.name: M:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.IColorProvider.GetColor(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines the Color for the row
member.param: Index of the row based on DataSource
Item on the index

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.PaletteCollection
member.summary: Creates PaletteCollection for row's visual. It repeats colors consecutively for rows.

member.name: M:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.PaletteCollection.GetColor(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines the Color for the row
member.param: Index of the row based on DataSource
Item on the index

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.SortData
member.summary: Creates SortData for DataGrid

member.summary: Sorting order for the column

member.name: P:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.SortData.Index
member.summary: Column Index to sort

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.SortDataTypeConverter
member.summary: Converts string to SortingOrder enum.

member.name: T:MauiToy.Controls.Libraries.SortingOrder
member.summary: Represents the sorting orders for DataGrid

member.name: M:Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ColorAnimationExtensions_Button.TextColorTo(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button,Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Color,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,Microsoft.Maui.Easing)
member.summary: Animates the TextColor of an to the given color
member.param: The target color to animate the to
The time, in milliseconds, between the frames of the animation
The duration, in milliseconds, of the animation
The easing function to be used in the animation
member.returns: Value indicating if the animation completed successfully or not
